content: I think you're referring to Gmail. Gmail creates multiple folders for a complete inventory and the folders are not really folders, they are labels. That is each email message exists once, but Gmail has several indices that point to it. That is why I always attempt to discourage users from subscribing to 'folders' such as Allmail, as that includes all mail, including trash. So, to solve your issue, I suggest you unsubscribe from those all encompassing gmail folders.
creator: davidsk

content: A comment: 1. Be sure all folders are set for allowing offline access. 2. to get all the messages be sure to do File>offline>download . Once you have that, you can exit TB, copy the folders from the IMAP account to your Local Folders folder and then you can access the messages in Thunderbird after closing the account.
creator: davidsk

content: If i paste the original .msf file into the local folders - Thunderbird immediately rebuild a new .msf when i start the client and then it only sees 109K messages.

content:
Stai installando direttamente dentro Thunderbird o dal browser?

Un metodo che puoi tentare:

  • Apri la pagina del dizionario nel browser
  • Click con il tasto destro sul bottone di download e scegli -> salva destinazione come
  • Salva il file
  • Avvia Thunderbird ed apri la schede delle estensioni (tasto menu > componenti aggiuntivi)
  • Trascina il file su questa scheda
